trustfund:
TF027167-PHRD-SECOND BEIJING ENVIRON.PROJ.(BANK-EXECUTED),TF039600-CHINA - SECOND BEIJING
            ENVIRONMENT PROJECT,TF036200-CHINA - BEIJING URBAN
            ENVIRONMENT PROJECT II,TF035844-CHINA - BEIJING ENVIRONMENT
            PROJECT II,TF024121-GEF2 - CHINA : SECOND BEIJING
            ENVIRONMENT PROJECT,TF027034-PHRD-SECOND BEIJING ENVIRON. PROJ.(REC-EXEC)

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Beijing Environment Project
            aims at a visible and sustained alleviation of air and water
            pollution in Beijing. The project consists of nine
            components: 1) The first component will support the
            conversion of medium-sized heating boilers from coal to
            natural gas. 2) The Gas Boiler Market and Technology
            Development component will support activities to develop
            industry-wide technical capacity, remove market information
            gaps, facilitate and aggregate market demands, reduce excess
            costs incurred by early converters, and structurally reduce
            the costs of gas boiler equipment and services. 3) The
            Heating Energy Conservation component will support the
            establishment of the technical and institutional basis to
            encourage sustained market-based energy conservation in
            various elements of the heating systems. 4) The Air Quality
            Monitoring and Decision Support System Improvement component
            will upgrade and renovate the existing monitoring stations.
            5) The Liangshui River System Sewers will be constructed. 6)
            The Liangshui River System Wastewater Treatment Plants will
            be constructed. 7) The Qing River System Sewers will be
            constructed. 8) The eighth component will support the
            institutional strengthening of the Beijing Drainage Company
            and its implementation support and training. 9) The Land
            Acquisition and Resettlement component will finance the
            compensation provided to the people and entities affected by
            the project.
